page.title: 19TRANSPORT
page.content: BUS SERVICE. Service no.61 between Wigton and Ireby runs on Tuesdays only, leaving Wigton at 9.30 and 12.10 and arriving at Ireby at 9.54 and 12.34. Buses leave Ireby at 9.55 and 12.35 arriving at Wigton at 10.19 and 12.59. Additional journeys (Monday to Friday when Wigton Schools are in session). 8.15 Uldale to Wigton via Ireby and 15.40 Wigton to Uldale via Ireby. BRITISH RAIL. The nearest railway station is at Wigton for trains North to Carlisle or South to Barrow. AIR TRAVEL. The nearest airport is Carlisle where Euroair do a daily flight to London costing Â£146 return. PRIVATE CARS. Of the questionnaires returned to us 40 said they owned a car while 7 said not. 8 people said they use the bus service, 27 said they never use it and 5 use it occasionally
